channel.title: Courses on Chao Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on Chao Zhang

item.description: CX4240: Introduction to Computational Data Analysis (2019 Spring) Course Information Lecture time: Mons and Weds, 4:30pm-5:45pm Location: Klaus 1447 Instructor: Chao Zhang Teaching Assistant: Hanjun Dai and Wendi Ren Piazza: https://piazza.com/class/jqeo3f7s5vc426 Course Overview This course introduces techniques for computational data analysis, with an emphasis on machine learning algorithms and their applications to real-world data. We will investigate the following question: how to extract useful knowledge from data computationally for decision making and task support?
